data.prayer: Father, help the 21,499 believers in Saint George to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint George, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 21,499 believers in Saint George, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 21,499 believers in the state of Saint George the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Spirit, help every believer in Saint George, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 21,499 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Saint George.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Saint George, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Saint George to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.focus_label: Saint George, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines

location.name: Saint George
location.full_name: Saint George, Saint Vincent and the Grenadines
